mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.meal, b.view_count, b.created_date, m.member_no, m.name from myapp_board b inner join myapp_member m on b.writer=m.member_no order by board_no desc

select b.board_no, b.meal, b.diet, b.view_count, b.created_date, m.member_no, m.name, f.food_no, f.food from myapp_board b inner join myapp_member m on b.writer=m.member_no left join myapp_food f on b.diet=f.food_no where board_no=#{boardNo}
